title: PM expresses gratitude to his UAE counterpart for extending greetings on Pakistan’s Independence Day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday thanked his UAE counterpart Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum for his warm greetings on Pakistan’s Independence Day.
“I thank Your Highness and the entire leadership of UAE for always standing with Pakistan in our journey towards peace, progress and prosperity. I am confident that by working together, we can build a bright future for our peoples. Long live Pakistan-UAE brotherhood,” the prime minister wrote on his official X account in response to the felicitation message by Prime Minister of United Arab Emirates (UAE) Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.
The UAE prime minister extending his felicitation to the leadership and people of Pakistan on the occasion of its Independence Day, reiterated his country’s steadfast commitment to strengthening bilateral collaboration, exploring new opportunities for growth, and working together to build a future of prosperity and success.
